amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 4095 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 57 - 39. Record Vote Number: 37.
Amendment SA 4095 proposed by Senator DeMint. (consideration: CR S1502, S1506-1510, S1515-1518) In the nature of a substitute.
